system:
note description: "Eiffel Vision pixmapable. Implementation interface." legal: "See notice at end of class." status: "See notice at end of class." keywords: "pixmap, bitmap, icon, graphic, image" date: "$Date: 2009-06-10 21:44:06 -0700 (Wed, 10 Jun 2009) $" revision: "$Revision: 79201 $"
deferred class ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE_I
inherit ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I redefine ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface end
feature -- Access
f_pixmap../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP -- Image displayed on Current. deferred end
feature -- Element change
f_set_pixmap../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_set_pixmapset_pixmap (a_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP) -- Assign a_pixmap to ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap. require pixmap_not_void: a_pixmap /= Void deferred end
f_remove_pixmap../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_remove_pixmapremove_pixmap -- Make ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap Void. deferred ensure pixmap_removed: ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap = Void end
f_pixmap_equal_to../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_pixmap_equal_topixmap_equal_to (a_pixmap: ../interface/ev_pixmap.xmlEV_PIXMAP): FalseBOOLEAN -- Is a_pixmap equal to ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap? do Result := attached ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_pixmappixmap as l_pixmap and then a_pixmap.../interface/ev_pixmap.xml#f_is_equalis_equal (l_pixmap) end
feature {../interface/ev_any.xmlEV_ANY, ../implementation_interface/ev_any_i.xmlEV_ANY_I} -- Implementation
f_interface../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xml#f_interfaceinterface: detachable ../interface/ev_pixmapable.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE note option: stable attribute end

end -- class ../implementation_interface/ev_pixmapable_i.xmlEV_PIXMAPABLE_I
